About me

I have studied bachelor's degree in Computer Science since 2019. I have done many courses, including Henry´s bootcamp what helped me to be a more proactive and patient person and eager to go on learning!

I have knowledge creating applications with technologies like React, Redux, NodeJS and PostgreSQL. JavaScript is my favourite programming language! Also I´m interested in learning Vue.js and Passport.js

Huellitas ©

Using Scrum methodology with a group of 8 people we worked on a Social Network App where you can post lost, for adoption or found pets. With the objective of solving a real problem, this app unify pets announcements in one place so information can be easier to find. It was made with various technologies such as React, Redux, TypeScript, NodeJs, JavaScript, WebSocket, Leaflet, FireBase, MongoDB and Passport.

Weather App

One of my first projects that I made in the Henry´s bootcamp. A weather application using React and requesting information of an API.

Recipe App

Individual project carried out during the bootcamp. Recipe App that allows you to create, search and view the details of various culinary recipes. It was made with various technologies such as React, Redux, Express, NodeJs, JavaScript and PostgreSQL.

Netflix App

Inspired by Netflix, I made this similar front-end app of the most popular streaming platform nowadays. It was made with Sass including the carousel, React and axios for the requests to The Movie Database API. The icons are from Material Icons.
